EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Used to notify the Customer when the Case has been created for Web & Portal origin Cases requesting to delete the account
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW - New Case Notification for Delete Account Web Portal
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We’ve received your request to delete your account. Your reference number is: {!Case.CaseNumber}
It may take up to 10 business days to delete your account.
We’ll be in contact with you if you have other products and services that will be affected by deleting your account.
You’ll receive confirmation once your account has been deleted.
In accordance with the MyPost Terms and Conditions we may retain a copy of your data so that we can comply with our regulatory obligations. See MyPost Terms of Use.
Kind regards, Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
